info.name: 3FA
info.description:
Backend API for the 3FA service which interacts with the client application, admin dashboard, and motion devices.

Note the variables `{{hostname}}` and `{{port}}` are placeholders for the hostname and port of the server which are usually `localhost` or `192.192.168.137.1` and `5000` respectively.

request.description: Get a list of past failed login events

response.name: List (No Images)
Email Specific
Session ID Specific
Invalid Email / Password
Not Admin User

request.description: Get a list of the current and past login sessions

response.name: Successful

item.name: Login

request.description: Check the uniqueness of a Pico ID generated
Initiate login step with motion device password

response.name: Expired Session
Wrong Stage

item.description: Login to the client application with an email

request.description: Upload a file to the authenticated client's account
List the files on the authenticated client's account
Download a file from the authenticated client's account
Delete a file on the authenticated client's account

response.name: Require An Auth Method
Duplicate Email
Missing Password (When Enabled)
Missing Motion Pattern (When Enabled)
Missing Photo (When Enabled)
Invalid Motion Pattern
